recipesJson.name: Berry Creamy
recipesJson.author: falon1000
recipesJson.description: A deep and alluring blend of forest berries, basking in a decadent silky vanilla cream.

reviews.text: Not got into berry profiles, this is the first of a couple using mixed berries. Very happy with the results of nice berry with the creams laid in and let it steep
This is the perfect summer companion to all the bright, fruity mixes I keep on hand when it's hot.  The berries make a nice break from all the tropicals and strawberries I surround myself with.
Pretty damn good recipe if I do say so. Steeps nicely @ around 2 weeks as well
